3508153a-555a-47be-b2db-17000144b9ae.description: Earners of this Skill Award digital badge will have completed courses in preparing them to become a Real Estate (RE) Salesperson. In order to apply to become a licensed Salesperson, 3 courses must be taken and passed: RE Principles, RE Practice, and 1 other approved RE course. See the websites of the CA. Dept. of Real Estate and the Office of Real Estate Appraisers for more information on licensing requirements, education, experience, & for employment as a RE Broker or a RE Appraiser.
3508153a-555a-47be-b2db-17000144b9ae.name: Real Estate Salesperson

f0130027-2591-45f5-bbfa-bcea7dbbce02.description: Earners of the Architectural Advanced Residential Design Skill Award digital badge will have the knowledge and skills for the advanced design techniques for a two-story multi-family structure. Introductory instruction in the area of interior design is also included. Upon completion of this Skill Award, the student may enter the workforce as an architectural and interior drafter/designer. This is the second of three stackable Skill Awards for Architectural Design.
f0130027-2591-45f5-bbfa-bcea7dbbce02.name: Architectural Advance Residential Design

badge_template_activities.title: Architectural Advanced Residential Design courses - Program Map

8b9ca6ea-3a95-4aa9-b40d-5919f17f814f.description: Earners of the Architectural Interior Design Skill Award digital badge have the knowledge and skills in the field of Interior Design. Upon completion of this Skill Award, the student will be able to design and document the requirements for residential and commercial spaces.
8b9ca6ea-3a95-4aa9-b40d-5919f17f814f.name: Architectural Interior Design

badge_template_activities.title: Architectural Interior Design course - Program Map

adaba480-e947-43ba-9aa5-5ffe17c67db4.description: Earners of the Architectural Introductory Residential Design Skill Award digital badge will have skills in introductory design techniques for a one & two-story residence. Upon completion of this Skill Award, the student may enter the workforce as a residential architectural drafter/designer. This is the first of three stackable Skill Awards for Architectural Design.
adaba480-e947-43ba-9aa5-5ffe17c67db4.name: Architectural Introductory Residential

badge_template_activities.title: Architectural Introductory Residential course - Program Map

c9b289a9-e961-4a86-9a42-f66bc851844d.description: Earners of the Architectural Visualization Skill Award digital badge have the knowledge and skills in the fields of Perspective Drawing and Descriptive Geometry. This will enhance the students’ skill in visualizing an architectural structure. Introductory training in the SketchUp and Rhinoceros software is also included. Upon completion of this Skill Award, the student will be able to create drawings needed for the preliminary design of an architectural project.
c9b289a9-e961-4a86-9a42-f66bc851844d.name: Architectural Visualization

badge_template_activities.title: ARCH 105 - Perspective Graphics w/Introduction to SketchUp and Rhinoceros

54321cbc-4cda-4575-9bf2-1abfba36b01f.description: Earners of the Architectural CAD Skill Award digital badge have the knowledge and skills in introductory and advanced techniques in the use of Computer Aided Design (CAD) software such as AutoCAD and Revit Architecture. Upon completion of this Skill Award, the student may enter the workforce as an Architectural CAD Technician.
54321cbc-4cda-4575-9bf2-1abfba36b01f.name: Architecture CAD

badge_template_activities.title: Arch 250 – Introduction to Autodesk Revit Architecture

b4c96a6a-3cfa-4fa7-8326-1a5d12d5e84f.description: Earners of the Architectural Commercial Design Skill Award digital badge have the knowledge and skills in the design techniques for the design of a one and two-story commercial structure. Advanced instruction in the area of interior design is also included. Upon completion of this Skill Award, the student may enter the workforce as a commercial and interior design drafter/designer. Students will also complete a portfolio of their work from previous architecture classes.
b4c96a6a-3cfa-4fa7-8326-1a5d12d5e84f.name: Architectural Commercial Design

5d6538b3-7784-4be0-b4b1-56a60db65b52.description: Earners of the Architectural Permit Technician Skill Award digital badge have the knowledge and skills in the fields of Building Codes and Print Reading. Upon completion of this Skill Award, the student will be able to apply the relevant codes and interpret the information on construction documents. With practical experience, students will be able to work as a Building Code Permit Technician.
5d6538b3-7784-4be0-b4b1-56a60db65b52.name: Architectural Permit Technician

badge_template_activities.title: Architectural Permit Technician course- Program Map

385d547a-f50f-4ed4-b6c1-0f6688ddf359.description: Earners of the Basic Electrocardiography (EKG) Skill Award digital badge have been provided with an overview and introduction to the basics of electrocardiography (EKG). The course content reviews principles of cardiac anatomy, physiology, and electrophysiology. Furthermore, course content includes cardiac hemodynamics, proper lead placement to obtain EKG waveforms, waveform identification, rate calculation, normal rhythm, and arrhythmia recognition and treatment.
385d547a-f50f-4ed4-b6c1-0f6688ddf359.name: Basic Electrocardiography (EKG)

8d6c0b05-a242-4693-bf11-8aa2f657708d.description: Earners of the Critical Care Nursing (CCN) Skill Award digital badge will be able to identify environmental factors influencing their role and implement evidence-based care strategies to prevent hospital-associated infections & complications. Earners can analyze pathophysiological behaviors of the major body systems and incorporate assessment findings into the delivery of patient care. Earners can recognize symptoms of common conditions experienced by acutely ill patients.
8d6c0b05-a242-4693-bf11-8aa2f657708d.name: Critical Care Nursing

764f19f0-2ad4-4747-bc5b-0e0838840c73.description: Earners of the Culinary Arts Skill Award digital badge have been introduced to the basics of food preparation, sanitation and service. Earners are exposed to the major components of the food service industry and can earn food safety handling certification.
764f19f0-2ad4-4747-bc5b-0e0838840c73.name: Culinary Arts

badge_template_activities.title: CULIN 113 - Institutional Sanitation Practices for Foodservice and Hospitality
CULIN 124 - Introduction To Baking And Pastry Arts

skills.name: Follow procedures and take directions-Follow directions
Properly measure and portion food items-Accurate food measurement & portion practices
Work in a safe and sanitary manner-Safe and sanitary practices

4e48f9eb-e6c1-4263-8bf7-4efb73bffafe.description: Earners of the EMR Skill Award digital badge will be able to discuss the significance of the Emergency Medical Services (EMS) system. Earners can explain the ethical responsibilities of healthcare providers, and describe the signs of common communicable diseases. Earners can demonstrate techniques for using personal protective equipment during the care of injured or sick people. See the websites of the National Registry EMT and L.A. County EMS Agency for more information.
4e48f9eb-e6c1-4263-8bf7-4efb73bffafe.name: Emergency Medical Responder (EMR)

skills.name: Knowledge of roles and responsibilities of the EMT and Pre-hospital Care provider

5f0cab84-6ba8-4d64-ac38-5295ce9cfdcc.description: Earners of the EMT Skill Award digital badge have the knowledge and skills to demonstrate the acquisition and interpretation of a patient’s vital signs and medical history. Earners can demonstrate management of an airway, maintenance of various advanced airway access devices, and oxygen delivery systems. Earners will be able to demonstrate various patient assessments, and determine priorities in care. See the websites of the National Registry EMT and L.A. County EMS Agency for more information.
5f0cab84-6ba8-4d64-ac38-5295ce9cfdcc.name: Emergency Medical Technician

badge_template_activities.title: EMT 139 - Introduction To Emergency Medical Service

skills.name: Knowledge of Patient health care rights

ad5b7c8a-2c33-443c-bb32-a7236c0f8d83.description: Earners of the Introduction to Emergency Services Skill Award digital badge have the knowledge and skills to discuss the structure and significance of the Emergency Medical Services (EMS) system. Students can describe the structure and general functions of various body systems, signs, and symptoms of common communicable diseases, and demonstrate techniques for using personal protective equipment. See the websites of the National Registry EMT and Los Angeles County EMS Agency for more information
ad5b7c8a-2c33-443c-bb32-a7236c0f8d83.name: Introduction to Emergency Services

badge_template_activities.title: Introduction to Emergency Services - Program Map

skills.name: Knowledge of roles and responsibilities of the EMT and Pre-hospital Care provider
